item.description:
We've reserved the Screening room at 360 State Street again! Come see a film for free at this great location!

Attendees: I will need your FULL NAME (and that of any +1) for the Concierge to let you in. Please Provide when you RSVP.

RSVP's are limited to 18 due to theater size, there should be NO Maybe's for this event.  Only RSVP if you're going to come, and change accordingly if something comes up.

This time we're doing a DVD of a T.V. show:

Three Sheets: Season 1 (2006 TV - Comedy/Travel/Documentary/Drinking)

Link to the IMDB Page,  Staring: Zane Lamprey

AJ's Description:  His name is Zane Lamprey... and his job... is to Drink.  Watch as this comedian travels the globe and learns about different Cultures Drinking Customs, local forms of Alcohol production, a few landmarks, and of course Hangover Cures.

You may have seen this show in its brief stints on Spike TV, Fine Living Network, or Comedy Central.  It was originally broadcast on MOJO, one of the world first all HD Networks that went belly-up a couple years ago.  You could also be familiar with Zane's current and similar show on HD-Net called "Drinking Made Easy" (It's not as good I.M.O.).

Warning: There is an optional Drinking game.  If you choose to partake, please be responsible!  If I know you drove and I get the impression you're not, I'll ask for your keys.

Event start time is 7:00 for the social portion, so you can start showing up then but please no earlier. We will not start the film until 7:30 or shortly there after, but don't plan to be any later.  (There are now restrictions on room time.)

Feel free to use the waiting list. If someone else backs out you can be automatically added, just provide your full name for the concierge as a contingency.  (I recommend RSVPing individually rather than using +1's if wait-listing.)

Snacks: Bring your own Snacks and Beverages. (Just Please be careful and responsible.) Sharing is encouraged!

Getting in: Enter the building through the State Street Entrance (Between the intersections of State with Court and Chapel) and talk to the Concierge, there are instructions with a phone number on the door and a call box with bell button. If you really have trouble, pre-movie-start time you can call/text AJ at 315-345-9348

Parking: There is metered street parking available near by on Orange Street and Court Street (some with Credit Card slot available.), obey the posted limits on the meter.  If you don't mind the longer walk, some of the Yale Lots are free in the evening/weekends. (I.E. Yale lot 51 on Temple Street.) 360's Parking Garage is open to visitors for Credit Card Customers only, the entrance is on State Street just to the Right of the buildings main entrance. Other local near by businesses may have open parking, however you're on your own there.

Don't think I really need to say this, but: This is basically an extension of my home I'm inviting you into, there for I expect everyone will treat it with respect and not risk future events (or my lease).
item.how_to_find_us: Ring the Bell Button or Call the concierge on the cell phone number on the door, they will Direct you. If you have added problems, call AJ at 315-345-9348.
item.name: 360 DVD: THREE SHEETS: Season 1
